248591.「あ…… あなたは……！？\n まさか 地上の民なのですか……？:
Y...you are...?! Are you someone who comes
from the surface world above...?

248592.「そんな……私を救おうなど 考えないで！\n この魔物は 危険です！\n 来ては:
You...you shouldn't have come! Don't even
think about saving me! This monster is much
too dangerous!

249179.「ああ…… どうして……。 \n 私は 囚われの身のままで よかったのに。\n:
Ah...why...? I was perfectly content being a
prisoner. Risking your life for something like
this is...

249180.「私は あなたに \n 救ってもらえるような者では ありません。\n 海底の国を:
I am not someone that you can save. The world
under the water was destroyed because of me.

249181.「そうですね……。\n あなたには すべて お話しするとしましょう。:
Yes, indeed...
I shall tell you everything.

249182.「……ある晩 ちいさなイカが\n この神殿に 現れました。\n とても遠方から:
One night, a little squid appeared in this
temple. It seemed to have come from a very
far away place.

249183.「海底の民と よく似ているけれど違う…… \n はじめて見る イカという生き物を:
How bewildered we were when we saw that
squid for the first time...a creature that was
so similar, yet so different from us.

249184.「……彼女は 悲しい瞳で 私に言いました。\n 私は たった ひとりきりのイカだ:
She looked at me with sadness in her eyes, and
said... "I am but a lonely squid. I too would
like a family to call my own."

249185.「私は その望みをかなえるべく 彼女の分身を \n 創りました。私は 望むままに:
I created a clone of her to fulfill her wish.
I possess a fragment of the power of creation
allowing me to create that which I desire.

249186.「……しかし 今にして思えば\n 身に余るチカラだったのでしょう……。:
But, in hindsight...that power was much more
than I could handle.

249187.「彼女の分身は 私の想定を超えて \n みずからの分身を 生み出すチカラを\n:
Her clone possessed the power to create
its own clones, far surpassing my
expectations.

249188.「ひたすらに増殖した 分身たちは心を持たず\n あたりを破壊し…… 瞬く間に……:
The endlessly-multiplying clones were heartless, destroying everything in their wake... In the blink of an eye, the once
beautiful country under the sea was nothing but ruins...

249189.「……私は 間違えていました。 \n 異なる姿の者でも 家族として国に迎えてやれ:
I was mistaken. Even beings with different
appearances, if welcomed into the kingdom
as family...that alone should've been enough.

249190.「本当に必要なのは \n 創生のチカラなどでは なかった……。:
What was truly necessary was not the power of
creation...

249191.「何千年 何万年 悔い続けても\n 起きてしまった この事実は\n もう どうし:
No matter how many thousands, or ten thousands
of years I regret it...the fact that it
happened cannot be changed...

249192.「けれど…… そうですね。\n このような愚かな私を救ってくれた あなたや\n:
But...that's right. You have saved a fool like
me, and the hearts of those who dwell under
the sea. I must repay your kindness.

249193.「この身が いつまで持つかは わかりませんが\n これからは できるかぎり\n:
I do not know how much time I have left, but
I will use the time that I have to purify this
temple as much as I am able.

249194.「ありがとう 地上の民よ。\n これは 私たちの仲間の印。\n どうか あなたに:
Thank you, dweller of the surface world.
This is a token of our companionship.
Please take it.

249195.「……さようなら 地上の民よ。: Farewell, dweller of the surface world...

249196.「せめて 私のチカラが 生み出す装備たちが\n この時代を生きる あなたがたに\:
I hope that this equipment created by my power
will be of some use to you...

253561.偽物のアンルシアを使った ピュージュの\n策略で キュロノスを倒した際 手に入れ:
Pyuju's trickery with the fake Anlucia
deprived him of the Evil War Seed he had
received when he defeated Kyuronos. Pursuing
Pyuju, they head for Gamilgo's Shield Isle,
where they are attacked by a horde of Pujes.
Although he is victorious, the ritual using
the Seed of Evil War Seed is completed, and
the gate to Demon World opens.

253562.門から出現した 魔族の将帥の一撃を浴び\n気を失う寸前 何者かが近づいてきた。\:
A demon general emerged from the gate, and
just before he was about to faint from a blow,
someone approached him. When he woke up, he
found himself in a strange world. According to
Yushka, a young man who claims to be a
traveler of the demon tribe, this is the Demon
World, and his blood contract with him has
changed his appearance into that of a demon.

253563.魔界の最高峰 デモンマウンテンのふもと\n大審門で 山頂に住む魔仙卿と会わなくて:
He is told that he will not be able to return
to his original form unless he meets with the
Oracle who lives at the Demongate on the
summit of Demon Mountain. Together with
Yushka, an emissary of the Demon King of
Farazard, they travel to Zechres and Valdista
to open the gate, and urge the Demon King of
each country to elect a Great Demon King.

253564.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと\nバルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い\n:
He met with Demon King Asbal in Zechres and
Demon Queen Valeria in Valdista, and made an
agreement to gather at the Demongate to help
solve their problems. When they arrive in the
Sand City Farazard, they discover that Demon
King Yushka is the Demon King of Farazard. He
accompanies Yushka on her quest to become
Great Demon King and heads for the Demongate.

253565.３人の魔王が 一堂に会し 大審門が開く。\nデモンマウンテン山頂への道には 大魔:
The three Demon Kings meet in one place, and
the Great Demongate opens. On the road to the
summit of Demon Mountain, there stood an
obstacle to test the qualities of Great Demon
Kings. Yushka, Asbal, Valeria and the others
overcame the trials and arrived at the summit,
where they found the Utopia-like Jyadain
Garden, where they finally met the Oracle.

253566.大魔王にふさわしい者として 魔仙卿に\n指名されたことで ユシュカと対立関係に。:
They fell out with Yushka when named Great
Demon King by the Oracle. The three Demon
Kings left, leaving behind deep misfortune.
Oracle urged them to touch the statue of the
source of the darkness, and it collapsed to
reveal a girl named Irusha, who restored their
original form. Head to the Oracle in Goda
Temple in Jyadain Garden for a new mission.

257408.「わしは 待っておった。\n そなたのような若者が 現れることを。: Long have I awaited this moment.

257409.「もし わしの味方になれば\n アストルティアの半分を お前に やろう。:
Come! Take thy rightful place at my side!
Do so, and I will grant unto thee dominion
over half of Astoltia!

257410.「どうじゃ？\n わしの味方に なるか？<yesno><close>:
What say'st thou? Wilt thou rule beside me?
<yesno><close>

257411.「……そうか。\n 味方になると 約束するのだな。: I see. You promise to be on our side.

257412.「しかし…… アストルティアは\n まだ わしのものではない。: But... Astoltia is not yet mine.

257413.「ここで そなたを 死霊の騎士にならしめ\n わが先兵として アストルティア征服:
Here, I will make you a knight of the dead,
and you will serve as my advance guard,
working for the conquest of Astoltia!

257415.「どうした？\n 世界の半分を ほしくはないのか？\n 悪い話では あるまい。<:
Thou wishes not for half the world? Wilt thou
not reconsider? 'Tis an offer few would
refuse...<yesno><close>

257416.「では どうしても\n このわしを 倒すと言うのだな！:
Thou wilt brook no such covenant? Thou art
resolved to face me no matter the cost?

257417.「おろか者め！\n 思い知るがよい！！: So be it. Come, fool! Know thy insignificance!

257448.道化師ピュージュを追って たどり着いた\nガミルゴの盾島で 瀕死の重傷を負い\n:
He was killed on Gamilgo's Shield Isle, while
in pursuit of the clown Pyuju, and awoke to
find himself in the Demon World... He was
transformed into a demon by a blood contract
with Yushka, a traveler of the Demon World. In
order to return to his original form, he and
Yushka went to the three Demon World countries
to meet the Oracle beyond the Demongate.

257449.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと\nバルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い\n:
In Zechres, he met the Demon King Asbal and
the Demon Queen Valeria at Fortress Valdista,
and in the Sand City Farazard, he discovered
that Yushka was also one of the Demon Kings.
Together with the three Demon Kings, he
climbed Demon Mountain and met with Oracle,
and was nominated as the one who is worthy of
becoming the next Great Demon King.

257450.魔仙卿の導きで 闇の根源の像に触れると\n像が崩れて イルーシャという少女が現れ:
When you touched the statue of the source of
darkness under the guidance of the Oracle, the
statue collapsed and a girl named Irusha
appeared and restored you to your original
form. Irusha used her ability to control the
miasma that erupted in the Demon World. You
went to Gora, land of Great Demon King
Madesagora, and met his grandson Peperogora.

257451.ゴーラの事件の解決直後 ヴァレリアが現れ\n魔瘴の巫女イルーシャを連れ去ろうとす:
Immediately after solving the Gora incident,
Valeria appears and attempts to take away the
demon miasma maiden Irusha, but Yushka, who
has been hiding among the soldiers, intervenes
and the maiden is taken away by Farazard. An
angry Valeria decides to start a war, and
Valdista's army invades Jyarimbaha Desert.

257452.魔仙卿の指示で向かった 旧ネクロデア領で\nユシュカの副官 ナジーンと再会し\n:
In the Old Necrodea Area, where he was
directed by the Lord of Magic, he is reunited
with Yushka's second-in-command, Nazine, who
guides him to Farazard, where he infiltrates
the city. It is revealed that Yushka's
kidnapping of Irusha was a ploy to provoke
Valdista, and with the addition of Zechres, a
Demon World War finally breaks out between the
three countries.

257453.王太后エルガドーラの操る ミアラの宝杖で\n太古の魔人と化した アスバルが放つ光:
Asbal's Staff, controlled by Queen Mother
Elgadora, transforms him into an Ancient
Demon, and the rays of light he unleashes burn
the battlefield to the ground. Covering Yushka
from the rays, Nazine loses her life. Valdista
is also defeated, and the great battle seems
to have ended with the victory of Zechres.
However, Oracle, who considers demons
dangerous, requests him to destroy Miara's
treasured staff.

257454.バルディスタは ゼクレスへの復讐戦を挑み\n戦いは 次の舞台へ。ゼクレス城の中庭:
Valdista challenges Zechres to a war of
revenge, and the battle moves on to the next
stage. In the courtyard of Zechres Castle,
Valeria is hit by a demon's beam of light and
disappears. With the help of Yushka, who
rushed to the scene, the Ancient Demon was
defeated, and the Demon World War came to an
end as the three countries were divided in
pain. To receive a new mission, we must go to
Oracle, who is in the Goda Temple in Jyadain
Garden.

262123.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い\n魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔:
Demon World, where he was mortally wounded in
the battle of Gamilgo's Shield Isle and taken
away by Yushka, a traveler of the demon tribe.
He is now traveling around Demon World in
order to restore his appearance, which has
been changed to that of a demon by a blood
contract. In Zechres, he meets Demon King
Asbal and Demon Queen Valeria at Fortress
Valdista, and in Sand City Farazard, he
discovers that Demon King Yushka is also one
of the Demon Kings.

262124.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた \nデモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し:
When you met with the Oracle at the summit of
Demon Mountain and touched the statue of the
source of darkness, it collapsed and a
girl named Irusha appeared from inside. The
Demon World countries plotted over Irusha's
ability to control miasma in anticipation of
the Age of Miasma, expected to arrive soon.
This was the beginning of the Makai War.

262125.三国相撃つ バルディア山岳地帯の戦いで\nファラザードの副官 ナジーンが命を落と:
In the battle of Valdia Mountain Region,
Farazard's second-in-command Najine lost her
life, followed by the battle of Zechres
Castle, where Valdista's Demon King Valeria
disappeared and Zechres' Queen Dowager
Elgadora died out. The war that covered the
entire Demon World ended with each of the
three kingdoms suffering a great blow.

262129.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する\nゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。:
At the request of Oracle, he rescues Zechres
Valdista, which is struggling to recover after
the war. In Zechres, he crushes the plot of
Archduke Ojalos, who is plotting to usurp the
throne. Demon King Asbal is determined to lead
his country by killing his mother, who has
been turned into a monster and then into a
Bomb, with his own hands.

262274.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が\n暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる\:
The bandits who want the throne are on the
rampage in Fortress Valdista, and Bertolo, who
believes Valeria is still alive, asks him to
find her. Valeria, who had been transformed
into a young girl named Tilia by the
fountain's curse, is restored to her former
state, and she returns home. When he returns
to Goda Temple after rescuing both countries,
Yushka appears and convinces him that he
should become the new Great Demon King.

262275.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると\n魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため:
While he was deciding whether to accept
Yushka's proposal or not, Oracle revealed his
true identity and promised to become the Great
Demon King to protect the world. Asbal and
Valeria also agreed to accept his position as
Great Demon King, and the coronation ceremony
was held at Demon King Yushka's castle, which
he had been graciously given as a gift.

262276.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を\n呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は\n:
At the coronation, Oracle summons a monster of
Evil Soul to attack the attendees. The Oracle
disappears, leaving behind a message that
Demon World is a place cut off from Astoltia.
His chamberlain, Carlow, has something to say.
Let's go to the throne room of Great Demon
King's castle.

264819.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い\n魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔:
Demon World, where he was mortally wounded in
the battle of Gamilgo's Shield Isle and taken
away by Yushka, a traveler of the demon tribe.
He is now traveling around Demon World in
order to restore his appearance, which has
been changed to that of a demon by a blood
contract. In Zechres, he meets Demon King
Asbal and Demon Queen Valeria at Fortress
Valdista, and in Sand City Farazard, he
discovers that Demon King Yushka is also one
of the Demon Kings.

264820.デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し\n魔瘴をあやつる少女 イルーシャとも\:
At the Summit of Demon Mountain, he meets
Oracle, and also meets Irusha, a girl who
wields demon miasma. Although he is able to
return from his demon form, a dispute over her
abilities leads to a major war involving the
three nations of Demon World. After a fierce
battle, the Demon World War comes to an end,
with each of the three countries suffering
tremendous damage.

264821.ゼクレス バルディスタの復興を手伝い\n両国の魔王を救うことで それぞれからの\:
You restored Zechres and Valdista and saved
the Demon Kings of both to gain their trust.
After Yushka changed his mind and the Oracle
revealed your true identity, you are promoted
to Great Demon King. During the coronation
ceremony at the Great Demon King's castle, the
Oracle summons Evil Souls, but are defeated by
the three countries' Demon Kings and soldiers.

264822.新たな大魔王の強さを 魔界の民に示すため\n反乱の芽を 自ら 潰すことになる。\:
In order to show the people of Demon World the
strength of the new Great Demon King, he
himself crushed the seeds of rebellion. In the
rebel hideout he infiltrated, he met a young
human named Narasia, who resembled Irusha, and
rescued him from captivity. As the Great Demon
King's fame steadily grows, an incident occurs
at Zahadigal Rock Peak in which a large amount
of demon miasma erupts.

264823.駆けつけた ザハディガル岩峰では\nフードを被った謎の集団が 目撃されており \:
You rushed to Zahadigal Rock Peak, and saw
hooded figures who had stopped the outpouring
of miasma. Soon, the hooded ones appeared in
the Great Demon King castle. It was Princess
Anlucia and companions who tried to defeat the
Great Demon King. After they engaged in a
stand-off with the Demon Kings, it was
revealed the Great Demon King was their ally.

264824.ジャディンの園で 魔瘴があふれ出したとの\n報告が入り アンルシア イルーシャ\:
We received a report that demon miasma had
overflowed in Jyadain Garden, so we headed
there with Anlucia and Irusha Yushka. In the
depths of Demon Mountain, there is a great
cavern where the Jagonuba Temple stands
tall. Deep within the temple, there is an
Oracle who is trying to suppress Jagonuba, the
God of Doom, but his attempts fail and he is
swallowed up by the demon miasma.

264825.半覚醒のジャゴヌバは ただのひと息で \n勇者を 魔王を 大魔王を 圧倒する。\:
With a single breath, the half-awakened
Jagonuba overwhelmed the Hero, the Demon King,
and the Great Demon King. It was Yushka's
master, the sage Malynn, who barely managed to
hold them back. Leaving Malynn alone in the
temple, the group was forced to return to the
Great Demon King's castle. Narasia, who had
fainted, woke up and we went to the doctor's
office in the east wing of Great Demon King's
castle.

268784.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い\n魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔:
Demon World, where he was mortally wounded in
the battle of Gamilgo's Shield Isle and taken
away by Yushka, a traveler of the demon tribe.
He is now traveling around Demon World in
order to restore his appearance, which has
been changed to that of a demon by a blood
contract. In Zechres, he meets Demon King
Asbal and Demon Queen Valeria at Fortress
Valdista, and in Sand City Farazard, he
discovers that Demon King Yushka is also one
of the Demon Kings.

268785.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた \nデモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し:
When you met with the Oracle at the summit of
Demon Mountain and touched the statue of the
source of darkness, it collapsed and a
girl named Irusha appeared from inside. The
Demon World countries plotted over Irusha's
ability to control miasma in anticipation of
the Age of Miasma, expected to arrive soon.
This was the beginning of the Makai War.

268786.三国相撃つ バルディア山岳地帯の戦いで\nファラザードの副官 ナジーンが命を落と:
In the battle of Valdia Mountain Region,
Farazard's second-in-command Najine lost her
life, followed by the battle of Zechres
Castle, where Valdista's Demon King Valeria
disappeared and Zechres' Queen Dowager
Elgadora died out. The war that covered the
entire Demon World ended with each of the
three kingdoms suffering a great blow.

268787.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する\nゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。:
At the request of Oracle, he rescues Zechres
Valdista, which is struggling to recover after
the war. In Zechres, he crushes the plot of
Archduke Ojalos, who is plotting to usurp the
throne. Demon King Asbal is determined to lead
his country by killing his mother, who has
been turned into a monster and then into a
Bomb, with his own hands.

268788.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が\n暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる\:
The bandits who want the throne are on the
rampage in Fortress Valdista, and Bertolo, who
believes Valeria is still alive, asks him to
find her. Valeria, who had been transformed
into a young girl named Tilia by the
fountain's curse, is restored to her former
state, and she returns home. When he returns
to Goda Temple after rescuing both countries,
Yushka appears and convinces him that he
should become the new Great Demon King.

268789.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると\n魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため:
While he was deciding whether to accept
Yushka's proposal or not, Oracle revealed his
true identity and promised to become the Great
Demon King to protect the world. Asbal and
Valeria also agreed to accept his position as
Great Demon King, and the coronation ceremony
was held at Demon King Yushka's castle, which
he had been graciously given as a gift.

268790.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を\n呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は\n:
At the coronation, Oracle summons a monster of
Evil Soul to attack the attendees. The Oracle
disappears, leaving behind a message that
Demon World is a place cut off from Astoltia.
His chamberlain, Carlow, has something to say.
Let's go to the throne room of Great Demon
King's castle.

273943.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い\n魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔:
Demon World, who was mortally wounded in the
battle of Gamilgo's Shield Isle and taken away
by Yushka, a demon traveler. In Zechres, he
meets Demon King Asbal and Demon Queen Valeria
at Fortress Valdista, and in Sand City
Farazard, he discovers that Yushka is also a
Demon King. At Demon Mountain, where the three
Demon Kings have gathered, he meets the elder
of Demon World, the demon miasma maiden of
miasma, Irusha.

273944.魔界の三国が激突する 魔界大戦が勃発し\nはげしい戦いの末 三国全てが\n大きな:
After the Makai War ended, all three countries
suffered great pain. You restored the Demon
World devastated by the war, and gained the
trust of the the Demon Kings and became Great
Demon King. During the coronation ceremony at
the Great Demon King's castle, the Oracle
summoned Evil Souls, but were defeated by the
three countries' Demon Kings and soldiers.

273945.新たな大魔王として 魔界各地で活動する中\nイルーシャと瓜二つの ナラジアと出会:
As Great Demon King, you met Narasia, the
spitting image of Irusha. After making peace
with Princess Anlucia who came to the Demon
World to defeat the Great Demon King, you went
to Jyadain Garden where the miasma was
overflowing and found that Jagonuba Temple was
deep in the Earth and that the source of great
darkness, Eldritch God Jagonuba, had awakened.

273946.ユシュカの師匠 賢者マリーンの助言により\nジャゴヌバに対抗する 唯一の手段とし:
Yushka's mentor, Sage Malynn, advises her to
resurrect the Goddess of Creation, Lutiana, as
the only means of countering Jagonuba. In
Light Town Finetka, Irusha is revealed to be
the goddess's dependent. The Six Saints tell
him that the way to revive the goddess is to
visit the shrines of the goddesses throughout
Astoltia with Irusha.

273947.祠巡りをしていく中 女神を復活させると\nイルーシャが 消滅してしまうこと……\:
As they visit the shrines, they discover that
Irusha will be extinguished if the goddess is
revived, and that Narasia, who was Irusha's
twin, is Jagonuba's dependent and has been
taken over by her will. The story reveals that
Naradia, Ilusha's twin, is a vessel for
Jagonuba and has been taken over by her
will. Irusha, who has manifested the will of
the goddess, leaves with Narasia and the Evil
God Pyuju, who are under her control.

273948.イルーシャを追って 女神復活のための\n儀式が行われる ルファ神殿へ行くことに。:
She follows Irusha to the Rufa Temple, where a
ceremony is held to resurrect the goddess.
They defeat the forbidding Evil Gods standing
in their way, including Yushka and Anlucia. At
the top of the temple, they battle the
taunting Evil God Pyuju, and with the help of
Malynn, who rushes to the temple, they defeat
him. Irusha bids farewell and disappears into
the river of light. Finally, the Goddess
Lutiana is resurrected.

273949.女神の復活と時を同じくして ジャゴヌバも\nまた 完全覚醒し 二柱の大神による\:
Jagonuba also fully awakened at the same time
as the resurrection of the goddess, and the
battle for the fate of the world between the
two great deities unfolded. Jagonuba, who had
absorbed the evil gods defeated by Lutiana and
raised their powers, struck a blow that
toppled the goddess, and the world was
enveloped in despair. Carlow, the attendant,
has something to tell us. Let us go to the
throne room of the Great Demon King's castle.
